mustVC: <:N_:848429469688397854> ・ You must be in a voice channel!
noVC: <:N_:848429469688397854> ・ Im not on any voice channel!

onVC: <:N_:848429469688397854> ・ I'm already on your voice channel!
errorJOIN: <:N_:848429469688397854> ・ An error occurred while trying to join the voice channel. Try using the **play** command!
